headlinerEvents.title: Pearl Opening Night
headlinerEvents.description: Kick off Pearl with a high-energy opening ceremony featuring performances, showcases, and announcements.

image.alt: Stage lights and crowd during the opening night

headlinerEvents.title: Battle of the Bands
headlinerEvents.description: Top campus bands compete live. Expect loud riffs, big vocals, and bigger crowd energy.

image.alt: Band performing on an outdoor stage

headlinerEvents.title: Esports Showdown
headlinerEvents.description: A competitive gaming tournament with live casting, finals on the big screen, and audience challenges.

image.alt: Gaming setup with keyboards and monitors
